title: The Secret Weapon - Kasumi
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>*Stare*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>What is it, Kasumi-chan? Is there something on Kanata’s face?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kanata-senpai, even though Kasumin, the rea~lly cute body pillow candidate that will probably offer the best experience, is right next to you, are you really fine with not using her?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata just took a nap earlier, so~. Kasumi-chan, do you want to be Kanata’s body pillow?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Honoka-senpai bragged about it. She said if you sleep with Kanata-senpai you’ll have a good dream~. To not know the wonders of using the really cute Kasumin as a body pillow, aren’t you at a loss, Kanata-senpai~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufu, that’s because there’s a big secret to it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>A secret?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kasumi-chan…. You’re my secret weapon. When the time comes, the chosen Kasumi-chan will be Kanata’s ultimate body pillow….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>The chosen…. Secret weapon…. The ultimate body pillow….!! Well, Kasumin kind of knew that already! Because it’s Kasumin!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata uses the secret weapon quite a lot. Kasumi-chan isn’t usually awake to remember it though♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh? Did you say something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Nothing~. Let’s do our best on practice today~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
